line.text: 'Add a new template by using the Template manager from your Personal console to activate this menu.'
'Click a ship to cancel the outfitting order.'
'Click a ship to enlist volunteers from the population. Outpost needs at least '

sval.val: Add a new template by using the Template manager from your Personal console to activate this menu.
Click a ship to cancel the outfitting order.
Click a ship to enlist volunteers from the population. Outpost needs at least
